graph_generator_params module¶

class graph_generator_params.GraphGeneratorParameters(E_cp=0.5, E_rp=0.2, E_ee=0.1, nb_nodes_per_region=100, nb_regions=4, max_diameter=12, min_cycle_length=3, target_ratio=1.01, min_distance_bt_producers=3, nb_producers_to_reach=3, edge_weight_mean=1.5, edge_weight_std=0.2)¶

Bases: object

Class containing the control parameters of the DHN generator. It englobes all the necessary control parameters of the graph generator. We note that all defined parameters are publicly settable and gettable within this class.

E_cp¶

Probability value of having center producer of the overall DHN (default = 0.5)

Type:

float

E_rp¶

Probability value of having producer(s) within a generated region (default = 0.2)

Type:

float

E_ee¶

Probability value of edges between generated regions. It controls the connectivity between the regions (default = 0.1)

Type:

float

nb_nodes_per_region¶

Number of nodes (or size) of each generated region (default = 100)

Type:

int

nb_regions¶

Number of regions to generate (default = 4)

Type:

int

max_diameter¶

Maximal diameter of the DHN, measured in hop-distances (default = 12)

Type:

int

min_cycle_length¶

Minimum size of acceptable cycles (default = 3). Any cycle with number of edges below this threshold will be broken.

Type:

int

target_ratio¶

Targeted ratio of #Edges/#Nodes

Type:

float

min_distance_bt_producers¶

Minimum distance between two distributed heat producers within the DHN, measured in hop-distance (default = 3)

Type:

int

nb_producers_to_reach¶

Number of heat producers to reach wihin the DHN, we note that it can be not achieved (default = 3)

Type:

int

edge_weight_mean¶

Mean of the normal distribution used to generate the edges’ weights (default = 1.5)

Type:

float

edge_weight_std¶

Standard deviation of the normal distribution used to generate the edges’ weights (default = 0.2)

Type:

flaot

SyntheticDHN
